reviews.review: just run and gun, valve doesn't want to fix that

nice game in general, but I am super mad right now because I just got a competitive derank and 7 days cooldown because I killed a teammate in a competitive match (He was shooting at the entire team and almost killed me one round) and he was bassically trolling, didn't give a s*** about the game nor the team, and didn"t get a cooldown, really valve? Sorry but downvote for this one.
